settings.desc1: ZEN is where balance is born, a wide spectrum of two extreme points. Two extremes that coexist and respect each other. The halfway point where diversity and new ways of doing things have a place, free of labels, in harmony and in tune with our interior.
settings.desc2:
We worship order and praise chaos. We seek comfort in our skin, and
discomfort in our ideas. We wear glasses to improve our thinking, and we listen to our hearts to live our truth.
settings.desc3:
We are innovative and traditional, extroverted and modest, smart and silly.

We are everything that happens in between the contrary, in a continuum of colour, full of genuine happiness, and limitless possibilities.

settings.desc5:

settings.title: GO OUT OF THE CONVENTIONAL
settings.desc: We design and manufacture glasses for people who seek to escape monotony, creating a perfect symbiosis between the glasses and the individual, as an extension of the person.

settings.title: FOCUSING ON THE PRODUCT
settings.desc: We design, produce, manufacture and distribute our product, controlling each phase, to guarantee your highest expectations. We always seek the highest quality through innovation.

settings.title:
LIVING WITH
TRADITION
settings.desc: We have been designing and manufacturing glasses for more than 40 years, always in a constant and infinite revolution. New collections are designed every 2 months.

settings.title: ENVIRONMENTAL AWARENESS
settings.desc: We reuse raw materials for a greater eco-responsible process, the important thing is not the material, but the use made of it.

settings.title:
LIMITED
EDITIONS
settings.desc: Each of our glasses have a serial number that identifies them in a limited production of 250 units.
